dcterms:description: A multimodal dataset for in-car command recognition in the Cantonese language, consisting of both visual and acoustic signals of drivers reading various in-car commands. It includes 200 unique commands recorded by 30 native Cantonese speakers, totaling 4,984 samples (8.3 hours) of data, which has been augmented with common in-car background noises to simulate real environments.
dcterms:title: Cantonese In-car Audio-Visual Speech Recognition (CI-AVSR)

dcterms:creator: Afouras, T.
Chung, J. S.
Zisserman, A.
dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for visual speech recognition, containing thousands of hours of spoken sentences from various BBC programs that include talking faces along with transcripts.
dcterms:title: LRS2-BBC

dcterms:creator: Afouras, T.
Chung, J. S.
Zisserman, A.
dcterms:description: A multimodal dataset for visual and audio-visual speech recognition, which includes face tracks from over 400 hours of TED and TEDx videos, along with the corresponding subtitles and word alignment boundaries.
dcterms:title: LRS3-TED

dcterms:creator: Stappen, L.
Baird, A.
Schumann, L.
Schuller, B.
dcterms:description: The MuSe-CaR dataset focuses on multimodal sentiment analysis in car reviews, containing audio-visual recordings from car review videos.
dcterms:title: MuSe-CaR
